summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 11 February to end of Friday 11 February GMT
description: Cold, settled weather early on Friday may lead to some local accumulations of air pollution by busy roads during the morning rush-hour period. Better dispersion is then expected throughout the day as a south-westerly breeze develops. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
